documents.document: It's been a year since the most beautiful afternoon of my life watching the rugby with @catcam_ https://t.co/kVnHgkUlNa

My lecturer is explaining the concept of brainstorming to us. I did not sacrifice my toast for this.
Summary of my day: didn't have enough time to make toast or a sandwich so ate two plain slices of bread on my way into uni

this roulette of overnight executive orders would be like a fun surprise if it wasn't people's lives at stake
bit concerned about going to sleep tonight cause who knows what executive order I will wake up to tomorrow
Reason why I cried today: thought a little too deeply about a world without dogs and upset myself

Wait wait I was busy this afternoon/evening and I've only just caught up with the #MuslimBan how has this happened so rapidly god help us
The ground is frozen which is nice because it's sparkly but also I'm going to slip and die farewell friends
I was supposed to be going out tonight but after that film I feel I need to lock myself in my room in silent reflection
Really was not ready to have my heart broken by La La Land I am a mess

Australia Day routine is get super hyped the night before and then cry into my vegemite toast in the morning cause I'm that bloody homesick

Questioned whether I was putting in too much cheese while cooking dinner. Trump presidency clearly already getting to me.
Accidentally made eye contact with the Mormons just for that second too long send help
It's been exactly a month since I finished my exams and thats like 30 days too long.
My plan of hiding in bed until my exam results come out has backfired because I'm now having nightmares where I dramatically fail my courses

Asked my personal tutor how his Christmas was and he informed me that his dog got cancer and died yesterday. Put my foot in that one.
@catcam_ better use for it than eating it
Really disappointed to announce that I just used a kale based moisturiser and now my skin feels amazing. I fit the stereotype.
New year, same me. Still treating myself to lunches I can't afford on a nearly daily basis.

Told my Dad I mopped the floor today and he asked whether I used a mop. What.
My phone died today while I was trying to snapchat a husky boldly leaning out his owner's van, a tragedy you can't all see it.
